attributes.action: Very tough jail sentences for dog/animal thefts
attributes.additional_details: Dog/animal theft needs to carry mandatory harsh prison sentences
attributes.background:
Peoples pets are their family members. Make dog/animal theft carry harsher sentences. This despicable crime needs to carry harsh prison sentences.
The animals and their owners deserve much better protection in the modern day. It’s not just a pet, it’s someone’s whole life

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Increase minimum and maximum sentences for pet theft
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563711
